MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 postcode area of Alloa, affecting properties in Charles Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 00:47AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault near to Fairyburn substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:20AM on 28 April 2021..
